AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Hugo Benavides: United States Border Patrol Agent who questioned Defendant at the Border Patrol station and did not corroborate Agent Trevino's testimony about the black truck having a camper
Defendant whose involuntary transportation to the Border Patrol station for questioning was deemed 'sufficiently like an arrest' and required probable cause, waived his Miranda rights during an interview with Agent Montemayor, testified that he did not feel free to leave even after being handed his citation
